member.name: M:Arithmetic.BasicMath.Addition(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Performs the addition calculation on the two inputted paramaters.
member.param: The value to add to input
member.returns: The Value of the 2 inputs added together.

member.name: M:Arithmetic.BasicMath.Subtraction(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Subtracts the second input from the first input.
member.param: The value to be subracted from.

member.name: M:Arithmetic.BasicMath.Division(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double@)
member.summary: Divides the first input by the second input.
member.returns: True if division was able, False if divisionAmount is 0 --DivideByZeroException.

member.name: M:Arithmetic.BasicMath.Multiplication(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplies the first input by the second input.
member.returns: The value of the muliplication calculation
